record.name: Config
record.prop: The CSS to drop selectors from.
Whether to keep the `@alternate` comment for Closure Stylesheets.
record.fn: The selector to check. Whether _TrapCSS_ should remove this selector. The `shouldDrop` hook is called for every CSS selector that could not be matched in the html. Return `false` to retain the selector or `true` to drop it.

types.type:
The dropped CSS.
<prop type="!Set" name="sels"> The used selectors.
